AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Reclamations priest
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] never really cared for the Tribunal, and was rather thrilled when [PAWN_pronoun] got word the Temple was being reformed. [PAWN_nameDef] decided to help rebuild the Temple, and eventually wound up taking on a permanent role at one of the shrines.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: dissident priest
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Once a loyal servent of the Tribunal Temple, [PAWN_nameDef] eventually learned the truth, the true events that transpired at the battle of Red Mountain. [PAWN_pronoun] tried to talk to [PAWN_possessive] peers, to help them see the light. But eventually grew anxious, as the Ordinators seemed to be closing in. So [PAWN_nameDef] fled to Holamayan, and awaited the visitation of the Incarnate.\n\nIn the coming years, and with the reformation of the Tribunal, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to resume [PAWN_possessive] previous role at the temple.
